channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: As a Black woman, I can vouch for a white, male VP prospect from Minnesota, Tim Walz

item.description: When President Joe Biden announced just a week ago that he would not accept the Democratic nomination for president, he did not pass the torch to Vice President Kamala Harris. He passed it to us.
item.source:markdown: When President Joe Biden announced just a week ago that he would not accept the Democratic nomination for president, he did not pass the torch to Vice President Kamala Harris. He passed it to us.
